title.rendered: HOEI VFX EVO Faithful TC5 Helmet

content.rendered:
• Meets or exceeds FMVSS-218 and DOT Safety Standards.
  • Visor lock keeps the outer visor firmly attached on the helmet while riding at High Speed, ensures safety.
  • Multiple vents for optimum ventilation, quick release and metal buckle offers solid protection.
  • Removable, replaceable and washable inner liner with Comtex Technology, softer, more comfortable and better fit.
  • Full face helmet comes with 2 visors(Clear and Mirrored Visors), both are compatible with Pin-lock anti-fog visor(Not Included) and 2 fins(Tinted Black and Mirrored Fins).
